description: AI-powered prompt refinement with adaptive questioning and multi-provider support (6+ LLM backends)

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini API key (optional, at least one provider required)

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Anthropic Claude API key (optional, at least one provider required)

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key (optional, at least one provider required)

GROQ_API_KEY.description: Groq API key (optional, at least one provider required)

QWEN_API_KEY.description: Alibaba Qwen API key (optional, at least one provider required)

GLM_API_KEY.description: Zhipu GLM API key (optional, at least one provider required)

PROMPTHEUS_PROVIDER.description: Override provider selection (gemini, anthropic, openai, groq, qwen, glm)

PROMPTHEUS_MODEL.description: Override model selection for the chosen provider
